articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: From arrest to flight - key dates in the Ghosn affair
articles.description: Ousted Nissan <7201.T> boss Carlos Ghosn decided to flee Japan after learning that his trial had been delayed until April 2021 and also because he had not been allowed to speak to his wife, sources close to Ghosn said on Thursday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Ousted Nissan (7201.T) boss Carlos Ghosn decided to flee Japan after learning that his trial had been delayed until April 2021 and also because he had not been allowed to speak to his wife, sources close to Ghosn said on Thursday. 
Ghosn, 65, the… [+2898 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kyrgios pledges money for victims of Australian bushfires
articles.description: Australian Nick Kyrgios has put his hand up to help the victims of raging bushfires in his country by promising a $200 donation for every ace he serves during the home summer season.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Australian Nick Kyrgios has put his hand up to help the victims of raging bushfires in his country by promising a $200 donation for every ace he serves during the home summer season.
